H0.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Kigali

H1.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Butare

H2.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Gisenyi

H3.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Kigli

A4.text: Its capital and largest city is Kigali, located at the centre of the country, at 1,567 metres above sea level.

A5.text: Other major towns include Ruhengeri, Butare, and Muhanga, all with populations below 100,000.
